channel.title: Can someone make the coordinates for lumbridge safe? please!
channel.description: I want to make Lumbridge a pk zone and I want the inside of the castle safe and everywhere outside of the castle to be wild. But, I don't want pking in the castle. And all the grass and the path to be wild. So, if you can post the coordinates, thanks.
